hypotheses.hypothesis: Increasing budget allocation to the retargeting audience will increase overall ROAS.
Replacing or refreshing creatives with high impressions and lower ROAS will improve overall campaign ROAS.
supporting_signals: Creatives with highest impressions showing ROAS between 7.83 and 20.65

hypotheses.hypothesis: Increasing budget allocation to the US market will increase overall ROAS.
Pausing or replacing creatives with ROAS below 3 will improve overall campaign ROAS.
supporting_signals: Creatives with lowest ROAS all below 3

hypotheses.issue: Platform performance disparity between Facebook and Instagram.
hypotheses.hypothesis: Reallocating budget from Instagram to Facebook will increase overall campaign ROAS.
Implementing more stable campaign settings (e.g., budget pacing, bid strategies) will reduce ROAS fluctuation and improve consistency.

hypotheses.issue: High performing creative opportunity for scaling.
hypotheses.hypothesis: Increasing budget or broadening the target audience for the creative 'Doctors recommend breathable modal â€” meet our men boxers' will increase overall revenue.
